briefTitle: PRidopidine's Outcome On Function in Huntington Disease, PROOF- HD
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Arm, Multicenter Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Pridopidine in Patients With Early Stage of Huntington Disease
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of pridopidine 45mg twice daily (BID) in patients with early stage manifest Huntington Disease (HD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Unified Huntington Disease Rating Scale-Total Functional Capacity (UHDRS-TFC) Score (mITT)
